verbs.description: [ARG0: The FBI] [V: tapped] [ARG1: a Cambridge professor] [ARG2: to gather information from Trump campaign advisers , as part of the Russia probe , in 2016] . [ARGM-PRD: Was he an informant , or a] spy ?

The FBI tapped [ARG0: a Cambridge professor] to [V: gather] [ARG1: information] [ARG2: from Trump campaign advisers] , [ARGM-MNR: as part of the Russia probe] , [ARGM-TMP: in 2016] . Was he an informant , or a spy ?
The FBI tapped a Cambridge professor to gather information from Trump campaign advisers , as part of the Russia probe , in 2016 . [V: Was] [ARG1: he] [ARG2: an informant , or a spy] ?
